page.description: You can check the 'Loop navigate' property in a List to turn on 'loop navigation'. With loop navigation, if the last row in the List is selected and the user presses the 'down' key, focus will go to the first row in the list (if Loop navigate null selection is unchecked) or will be set to NULL (if Loop navigate null selection is checked)
